title: One Piece
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: Monkey D. Luffy sets off on an adventure to find the legendary One Piece treasure and become the Pirate King.

title: Naruto
author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with a sealed demon fox within him, strives to become the Hokage of his village.

title: Bleach
author: Tite Kubo
description: Ichigo Kurosaki gains Soul Reaper powers and must protect the living world from evil spirits called Hollows.

title: Dragon Ball
author: Akira Toriyama
description: Son Goku's journey from childhood to adulthood as he trains in martial arts and explores the world in search of Dragon Balls.

title: Attack on Titan
author: Hajime Isayama
description: In a world where humanity lives within enormous walled cities to protect themselves from Titans, giant humanoid creatures.

title: Death Note
author: Tsugumi Ohba
description: Light Yagami finds a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name in it.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
author: Hiromu Arakawa
description: Two brothers use alchemy in their quest to restore their bodies after a failed attempt to bring their mother back to life.

title: My Hero Academia
author: Kohei Horikoshi
description: In a world where most people have superpowers, a powerless boy dreams of becoming a hero.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
author: Koyoharu Gotouge
description: Tanjiro becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered and his sister is turned into a demon.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
author: Gege Akutami
description: Yuji Itadori joins a secret organization of Jujutsu Sorcerers to kill a powerful Curse named Ryomen Sukuna.

title: Hunter x Hunter
author: Yoshihiro Togashi
description: Gon Freecss discovers his father is a world-renowned Hunter and decides to follow in his footsteps.

title: One-Punch Man
author: ONE
description: Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, seeks to find a worthy opponent.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
author: Sui Ishida
description: Ken Kaneki becomes half-ghoul after a deadly encounter and must navigate both human and ghoul society.

title: Berserk
author: Kentaro Miura
description: Guts, a lone mercenary, struggles against his fate while battling demons in a dark medieval world.

title: Vinland Saga
author: Makoto Yukimura
description: Thorfinn, son of a great warrior, seeks revenge against the man who killed his father.

title: Kingdom
author: Yasuhisa Hara
description: Two war orphans dream of becoming great generals during China's Warring States period.

title: Vagabond
author: Takehiko Inoue
description: The story of Miyamoto Musashi, Japan's greatest swordsman, on his path to enlightenment.

title: Monster
author: Naoki Urasawa
description: A brilliant surgeon's life is turned upside down when the boy he saved turns out to be a serial killer.

title: 20th Century Boys
author: Naoki Urasawa
description: A group of friends must stop a cult leader whose plans mirror a story they wrote as children.

title: Gantz
author: Hiroya Oku
description: People who die are transported to a room where they must hunt aliens to earn their freedom.

title: Fruits Basket
author: Natsuki Takaya
description: Tohru Honda discovers that members of the Soma family transform into zodiac animals when hugged.

title: Ouran High School Host Club
author: Bisco Hatori
description: Haruhi Fujioka accidentally breaks a vase and must work as a host to pay off her debt.

title: Skip Beat!
author: Yoshiki Nakamura
description: Kyoko Mogami enters show business to get revenge on the childhood friend who used her.

title: Kamisama Kiss
author: Julietta Suzuki
description: A homeless girl becomes a land god and must deal with her fox familiar who refuses to accept her.

title: Kaichou wa Maid-sama!
author: Hiro Fujiwara
description: A strict student council president secretly works at a maid caf√© and is discovered by the school's most popular boy.

title: Vampire Knight
author: Matsuri Hino
description: Yuki Cross protects the secret of the Night Class at her academy, where all the students are vampires.

title: Nana
author: Ai Yazawa
description: Two young women named Nana, with very different personalities, become roommates in Tokyo.

title: Lovely Complex
author: Aya Nakahara
description: A tall girl and a short boy, known as 'All Hanshin Kyojin,' navigate high school love and comedy.

title: Special A
author: Maki Minami
description: Hikari has always been second to Kei in everything and is determined to beat him one day.

title: Kare Kano
author: Masami Tsuda
description: Two model students who hide their true selves discover each other's secrets.

title: Nodame Cantabile
author: Tomoko Ninomiya
description: A perfectionist music student meets an eccentric piano prodigy who changes his life.

title: Honey and Clover
author: Chica Umino
description: The lives and loves of a group of art college students as they navigate their futures.

title: Chihayafuru
author: Yuki Suetsugu
description: Chihaya dreams of becoming the best karuta player in Japan.

title: Paradise Kiss
author: Ai Yazawa
description: A high school student is recruited by fashion design students to be their model.

title: Usagi Drop
author: Yumi Unita
description: A 30-year-old bachelor takes in his grandfather's illegitimate 6-year-old daughter.

title: Kids on the Slope
author: Yuki Kodama
description: In 1960s Japan, a classical pianist bonds with a jazz-loving delinquent.

title: Princess Jellyfish
author: Akiko Higashimura
description: A jellyfish-obsessed girl and her otaku housemates befriend a cross-dressing fashionista.

title: March Comes in Like a Lion
author: Chica Umino
description: A young professional shogi player deals with depression while finding family in three sisters.

title: 7 Seeds
author: Yumi Tamura
description: Groups of young people wake up in a post-apocalyptic Japan and must survive.

title: Black Clover
author: Yuki Tabata
description: In a world where everyone has magic, Asta is born without any and dreams of becoming the Wizard King.

title: Fairy Tail
author: Hiro Mashima
description: Lucy joins the Fairy Tail wizard guild and embarks on adventures with Natsu and friends.

title: Blue Exorcist
author: Kazue Kato
description: Rin Okumura discovers he is the son of Satan and decides to become an exorcist.

title: Soul Eater
author: Atsushi Ohkubo
description: Students at Death Weapon Meister Academy train to create Death Scythes from human weapons.

title: The Seven Deadly Sins
author: Nakaba Suzuki
description: Princess Elizabeth seeks the legendary knights known as the Seven Deadly Sins to save her kingdom.

title: Food Wars! Shokugeki no Soma
author: Yuto Tsukuda
description: Soma Yukihira enrolls in an elite culinary academy to become a top chef.

title: Haikyuu!!
author: Haruichi Furudate
description: Hinata Shoyo joins his high school volleyball team despite his short stature.

title: Kuroko's Basketball
author: Tadatoshi Fujimaki
description: The invisible sixth man of the Generation of Miracles teams up with a talented player.

title: Slam Dunk
author: Takehiko Inoue
description: A delinquent joins the basketball team to impress a girl and discovers his talent.

title: Ace of Diamond
author: Yuji Terajima
description: A young pitcher joins a prestigious baseball school aiming for Koshien.

title: Eyeshield 21
author: Riichiro Inagaki
description: A timid boy's incredible running ability makes him the secret weapon of his football team.

title: SPY x FAMILY
author: Tatsuya Endo
description: A spy must build a fake family to complete a mission, unknowingly adopting a telepath and marrying an assassin.

title: Chainsaw Man
author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
description: Denji becomes Chainsaw Man after merging with his chainsaw devil dog to pay off his debt.

title: Kaiju No. 8
author: Naoya Matsumoto
description: A man who dreams of joining the Defense Force gains the power to transform into a kaiju.

title: Mashle: Magic and Muscles
author: Hajime Komoto
description: In a world of magic, a boy with no magic uses his muscles to survive in a magic school.

title: The Promised Neverland
author: Kaiu Shirai
description: Orphans discover the dark truth about their idyllic orphanage and plan their escape.

title: Dr. Stone
author: Riichiro Inagaki
description: After humanity is petrified for 3,700 years, a genius scientist works to rebuild civilization.

title: World Trigger
author: Daisuke Ashihara
description: An organization defends Earth from interdimensional invaders called Neighbors.

title: Assassination Classroom
author: Yusei Matsui
description: Students must assassinate their alien teacher before he destroys the Earth.

title: Gintama
author: Hideaki Sorachi
description: In an alternate Edo period invaded by aliens, a samurai takes on odd jobs.

title: Hell's Paradise: Jigokuraku
author: Yuji Kaku
description: A ninja on death row is sent to find the elixir of immortality on a dangerous island.

title: Parasyte
author: Hitoshi Iwaaki
description: A teenager's right hand is taken over by an alien parasite, and they must coexist.

title: Ajin: Demi-Human
author: Gamon Sakurai
description: A student discovers he is an immortal Ajin and becomes a target for the government.

title: Blade of the Immortal
author: Hiroaki Samura
description: An immortal samurai agrees to help a girl avenge her parents' deaths.

title: Claymore
author: Norihiro Yagi
description: Half-human, half-demon warriors called Claymores fight demons in a medieval world.

title: Pluto
author: Naoki Urasawa
description: A robot detective investigates a series of murders targeting the world's most advanced robots.

title: Holyland
author: Kouji Mori
description: A bullied teenager finds purpose through street fighting.

title: Homunculus
author: Hideo Yamamoto
description: A man gains the ability to see people's inner selves after undergoing trepanation.

title: Ichi the Killer
author: Hideo Yamamoto
description: A yakuza enforcer searches for a psychotic killer who murdered his boss.

title: Ghost in the Shell
author: Masamune Shirow
description: A cyborg policewoman hunts criminals in a futuristic Japan.

title: Akira
author: Katsuhiro Otomo
description: In post-apocalyptic Neo-Tokyo, a biker gang member gains psychic powers.

title: Blue Lock
author: Muneyuki Kaneshiro
description: 300 young strikers compete in a prison-like facility to become Japan's best striker.

title: Ao Ashi
author: Yugo Kobayashi
description: A talented soccer player from Ehime joins a J-League youth team.

title: Yotsuba&!
author: Kiyohiko Azuma
description: A quirky green-haired girl discovers the wonders of everyday life.

title: Grand Blue Dreaming
author: Kenji Inoue
description: A college student joins a diving club that's more about drinking than diving.

title: Hinamatsuri
author: Masao Ohtake
description: A yakuza member becomes the guardian of a girl with psychic powers.

title: Spy Classroom
author: Takemachi
description: A legendary spy trains a group of misfit girls to become elite spies.

title: Horimiya
author: HERO
description: Two high school students discover each other's secret personas.

title: Kaguya-sama: Love Is War
author: Aka Akasaka
description: Two prideful geniuses try to make the other confess their love first.

title: The Quintessential Quintuplets
author: Negi Haruba
description: A poor student tutors five identical quintuplet sisters and falls for one of them.

title: Rent-A-Girlfriend
author: Reiji Miyajima
description: After being dumped, a college student rents a girlfriend and gets caught in a web of lies.

title: Don't Toy with Me, Miss Nagatoro
author: Nanashi
description: A sadistic girl constantly teases her shy upperclassman.

title: Fly Me to the Moon
author: Kenjiro Hata
description: A boy agrees to marry a mysterious girl who saved his life.

title: Toradora!
author: Yuyuko Takemiya
description: A fierce girl and a scary-looking boy team up to help each other with their crushes.

title: Nisekoi
author: Naoshi Komi
description: A yakuza heir and gang leader's daughter pretend to date to keep peace.

title: Your Lie in April
author: Naoshi Arakawa
description: A former piano prodigy meets a violinist who helps him return to music.

title: A Silent Voice
author: Yoshitoki Oima
description: A former bully seeks redemption by reconnecting with the deaf girl he tormented.

title: Land of the Lustrous
author: Haruko Ichikawa
description: Gem-people fight against moon dwellers who seek to capture them.

title: Made in Abyss
author: Akihito Tsukushi
description: A girl descends into a mysterious abyss to find her mother with a robot companion.

title: Golden Kamuy
author: Satoru Noda
description: A war veteran and an Ainu girl search for hidden gold in Hokkaido.

title: Dorohedoro
author: Q Hayashida
description: A man with a lizard head searches for the sorcerer who cursed him.

title: Mob Psycho 100
author: ONE
description: An overpowered psychic middle schooler tries to live a normal life.

title: To Your Eternity
author: Yoshitoki Oima
description: An immortal being takes on forms of things that leave strong impressions on it.

title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
author: Kanehito Yamada
description: An elf mage reflects on her journey with heroes after their quest ends.

title: Dandadan
author: Yukinobu Tatsu
description: A girl who believes in ghosts and a boy who believes in aliens team up.

title: Sakamoto Days
author: Yuto Suzuki
description: A retired legendary hitman now runs a convenience store with his family.

title: Rurouni Kenshin
author: Nobuhiro Watsuki
description: A wandering samurai with a reverse-blade sword seeks redemption in Meiji-era Japan.

title: InuYasha
author: Rumiko Takahashi
description: A modern girl travels to feudal Japan and teams up with a half-demon to find jewel shards.

title: Ranma 1/2
author: Rumiko Takahashi
description: A martial artist cursed to change gender when splashed with water.

title: Sailor Moon
author: Naoko Takeuchi
description: A teenage girl transforms into a magical warrior to save the world.

title: Cardcaptor Sakura
author: CLAMP
description: A girl must capture magical cards she accidentally released.
